classes.name: BLS for HealthCare Provider
classes.description: BLS (Basic Life Support) is American Health Association’s CPR for Healthcare Professionals. Our course covers adult, child, and infant CPR, two-person rescue and choking.

classes.name: Certified CPR, AED, First Aid
classes.description: Heartsaver™ CPR/AED Certification, First-Aid. Learn to save a life! We train individuals and groups, and are ecstatic to teach our knowledge to others

classes.name: Blended Training and Certification
classes.description: Blended learning is conducted in two sessions. The first session involves virtual learning on the American Heart Association website, followed by an in-person experience with our certified instructors.
